column1: For more than 250000 families around the country today marks the first Thanksgiving and the first of many holidays without a loved one due to the coronavirus. My team and I extend our deepest sympathies and condolences to those mourning. 5/

If this virus wasn't disproportionately affecting people of color would the White House handle this the same way it has so far?  If 1 in 1000 White Americans had died of Covid-19 would the White House be holding funds that could be used to make testing more widely available? https://t.co/Pk6Q9IS733
The first step to defeating COVID-19 is defeating Donald Trump tomorrow.
This week Donald Trump walked away from negotiations for COVID relief for millions of Americans.  @JoeBiden will never walk away from those who elected him to serve.
